entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
